name: directus_playground
description: This template shows my current approach to monitor and test applications build with directus, especially flows and extensions. This repo simulates a simple event ticketing system by using Directus extensions/flows, Handlebars.js, Websockets and Vonage. No SPA framework needed. The testing is done with Playwright.

scripts.build: npm ci --prefix ./utils && npm ci --prefix ./app && npm run build --prefix ./app && npm install --prefix ./tests

author: Daniel Band
